channel.title: [PI] Minigame Help please
channel.description:
Hi i am wanting some sort of snippet that i can use to help create a waiting room timer for a minigame im building and also somesort of ingame timer as well, i have not done this before on project insanity.
So if any1 could help me please do, or possible leave me a link to a tut of some sort of minigame where an ingame and waiting room timer is used so i may use as a guide.
thanks,
oh i also am after some help to create a portal, that when used will send the player to team with least in waiting room so if anyone has any info on how to do that aswell. Help is much welcome
